as if to remind him that it was not for him to jest. 
"When am I to receive the money, Count?" 
Rost6v, flushing, drew D61okhov into the next room. 
"I cannot pay it all immediately. Will you take an I.O.U.?" he said. 
"I say, Rost6v," said D61okhov clearly, smil- ing and looking Nicholas straight in the eyes, "you know the saying, 'Lucky in love, unlucky at cards.' Your cousin is in love with you, I know."
